name: Dragon Loop
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 47 jam game.

Please visit following address to score it.

Brief
Click and survive and slay.

Beat dragons as many as you can.

Left mouse click to select.
Left mouse click to attack once.

Please leave your comments!

Credits
- Monster assets: Material World
- Icons: 
https://v3x3d.itch.io/bountiful-bits
https://v3x3d.itch.io/bit-bonanza
- VFX:
https://opengameart.org/content/hit-animation-2-frame-by-frame
